sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'


export default function NewForm({handleSubmit}) {
    return (
        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <textarea 
            className="comment__text-container" 
            name="comment" 
            rows="10" 
            cols="50" 
            placeholder="Add a new comment"></textarea>
            <button>Submit Task</button>
        </form>
    )
}
